name: SilvyGotchi
description:
Silvervale Tamagotchi!

Get to take care of your waifu in her cutest forms. Make sure to check on her every so often to ensure she doesn't die, her life is in your hands.

Use the buttons on the right (tap on them) to take care of her needs. Feed her Jerky when she's hungry, use one of the beverages to fill her thirst and clean her on the tub whenever she feels dirty. Look at the status bars to see what your waifu needs.

If a status bar falls too low Silvy will get angry at you and her health will start to drop. If you let her well being fall to 0, your waifu will die. 

Each day your waifu lives, she'll love you more and more and give you love points, which you can spend in the stores. Keep an eye out for V coins whenever you enter the room, tap on them to pick them up and use them to buy cool stuff. 

More items to buy on store soon.
